TopicTitle: Making a VTOL or Skycrane work!

Articles.Content:
Hi!

So, I played out a mission yesterday where i said i would put out a video explaining how you make Skycranes work in KSP, so here it is!

Hopefully someone will get their VTOLs working now, enjoy!

Keep the pointy side up!
I am in no way qualified, but in my experience in VTOLs, the CoT needs to be exactly on the CoM in order to have stable upwards thrust. I'd try moving engines around to see if that works.
